div.p: J.J.A. formulated the original idea to conduct this modelling work. J.J.A. and W.W.L.C conceived and designed the study. A.C.-M. provided the EwE-model template, species and food-web data. J.J.A. collected contaminant data for the Ecotracer module, conducted the modelling work and wrote the manuscript. U.R.S. provided inputs, guidance and mentorship. All authors reviewed and commented on the manuscript.
